name: Mount Ishikawa Loop
description: Experience this 3.7-km loop trail near Uruma Shi, Okinawa. Generally considered a challenging route, it takes an average of 1 h 30 min to complete. This is a very popular area for hiking and walking, so you'll likely encounter other people while exploring. The best times to visit this trail are November through May.

name: Mount Katsuu
description: Explore this 1.4-km out-and-back trail near Kunigami, Okinawa. Generally considered a moderately challenging route. This is a very popular area for hiking, rock climbing, and walking, so you'll likely encounter other people while exploring. The best times to visit this trail are January through May.

name: Jawbone Ridge Loop
description: Check out this 10.9-km loop trail near Kunigami, Okinawa. Generally considered a challenging route, it takes an average of 3 h 56 min to complete. This is a very popular area for birding, hiking, and walking, so you'll likely encounter other people while exploring. The best times to visit this trail are January through May.

name: Mount Awadake
description: Head out on this 4.0-km loop trail near Nago, Okinawa. Generally considered a challenging route, it takes an average of 1 h 50 min to complete. This is a very popular area for hiking, so you'll likely encounter other people while exploring. The best times to visit this trail are September through April.

name: Ta-taki Falls
description: Explore this 2.1-km out-and-back trail near Kunigami, Okinawa. Generally considered a moderately challenging route, it takes an average of 36 min to complete. This is a very popular area for hiking and walking, so you'll likely encounter other people while exploring. The best times to visit this trail are June through June. Dogs are welcome, but must be on a leash.

name: Yamadasakugawa-no-Ishibashi - Ishikawa Kougen Observatory
description: Explore this 3.9-km out-and-back trail near Uruma Shi, Okinawa. Generally considered a moderately challenging route, it takes an average of 1 h 17 min to complete. This is a very popular area for birding, hiking, and walking, so you'll likely encounter other people while exploring. The best times to visit this trail are October through May.

name: Hiji Otaki Falls
description: Explore this 2.7-km out-and-back trail near Kunigami, Okinawa. Generally considered a moderately challenging route, it takes an average of 49 min to complete. This is a very popular area for hiking and walking, so you'll likely encounter other people while exploring. The best times to visit this trail are December through December.

name: Fukugawa Falls
description: Try this 2.1-km out-and-back trail near Nago, Okinawa. Generally considered a moderately challenging route, it takes an average of 44 min to complete. This is a very popular area for hiking and walking, so you'll likely encounter other people while exploring. The best times to visit this trail are June through July.

name: Indy Jones Mile
description: Explore this 1.3-km loop trail near Nanjo, Okinawa. Generally considered a moderately challenging route. This is a very popular area for hiking and walking, so you'll likely encounter other people while exploring. The best times to visit this trail are April through May.

name: Nakagusuku Hanta Road
description: Try this 12.7-km out-and-back trail near Ginowan Shi, Okinawa. Generally considered a moderately challenging route, it takes an average of 4 h 0 min to complete. This is a very popular area for hiking and walking, so you'll likely encounter other people while exploring. The best times to visit this trail are September through February.
